title: GM’s Final EV Battery Strategy Copies China’s Playbook: Super Cheap Cells
description: General Motors’ homemade version of the low-cost power option favored by China’s auto industry will hit three years before its super energy-dense tech arrives—and could bring affordable US EVs sooner.
